title: Ranked
body: Is ranked down cause I've been playing ranked all night and i logged out and now I'm not able to anymore, i was lagging pretty bad one of the games but I didn't disconnect or anything. It's weird it only offers blind and draft pick

replies.body: ranked was down for a short period as we prepared for the new patch.  Be sure to bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates on scheduled downtime or live issues.  Everything should be up now!

Im having the same issue. I just logged on to play a ranked game and there is no option for either flex or normal ranked queue. There isnt any message or warning like they usually put out for us when they are experiencing issues. Hope it gets fixed soon.
